alert.note: Alert for Delta; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 9:39AM CST until March 03 at 6:14PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... North Sulphur River Near Cooper affecting Delta and Lamar Counties. South Sulphur River Near Cooper affecting Delta and Hopkins Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Sulphur River Near Cooper. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Minor flooding will occur along the river. Agriculture and livestock near the river will be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 1.5 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 31.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
